titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
SERVICE 1922 Mr. R. W. Service Dec 1st 115 bis Place du Pantheon
3 mos 2 vols 30 Dep 14 not refunded Dec 1st When Winter comes to Main Street Dec 4 Twelve Men Dec 6 Dec 4 Through The Shadows With O.Henry " " Dec 6 Books + Their Writers Dec 14 " George Gissing 3 Vanity Fair Dec 8 Dec 14 2 Vanity Fair (0.15) Dec 19 Books on the Table Dec 16 Life of Mrs Stevenson Dec 16 Letters of Mark Twain Dec 23 Dec 23 Our America Dec 23 Tahiti Renewed Jan 22 Calderon Dec 26 Nights Dec 26 Dec 28 George Meredith Life + Letters Jan 22 Feb 15 Reputations Feb 17 Feb 17 The Prussian Officer March 1st 1923 Oct 6. renew October 6th 3 m 2 vols. 40 " " Bliss Nov. 18 2.40 Nov 13 Things that have interested me Nov. 20 " " Friday Night " " Nov 20 Sea and Sardinia Dec 12 " " 1001 Afternoons in Chicago Nov 27 Nov 27 Prize Stories O Henry Memorial Dec 12
Dec 22 Letters of Tchekov Jan 22 Old Calabria " " Jan 22 Renewed to Feb 6th 2 vol = 16f.
1924 Renewed 3 mos 1 v 30 Nov 14 Nov 14 Eighteen Nineties Nov 19 " 19 Joseph Conrad (0.15) Dec 3 Dec 8 James Joyce (0,15) Dec 26 " 26 Best Short Stories 1923 Eng Jan 20 1926 Jan 22. Renewed to Feb. 22 = 15.f. " " Sexual Life in Our Time B.B.
